entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
